attributes.action: The next Prime minister must be one that campaigned to leave the European Union
attributes.background:
The favorites to take the position of Conservative leader and Prime minister are mainly from the Remain campaign.
This should not be allowed in the interests of Great Britain

rejection.details: In any case, as you might already know, the Prime Minister of the UK is not chosen by the UK Government or Parliament, and the leadership of the Conservative party is an internal matter for that party.
